title: Riverfront Hotel Redevelopment
shortDescription: Redeveloping a historic waterfront hotel into a mixed-use hospitality hub.
fullDescription: The project revitalizes a historic hotel along the Inner Harbor, adding 180 rooms, a conference center, and retail space. Regional center sponsorship allows indirect job creation counting.

title: Green Tech Manufacturing Campus
shortDescription: Direct investment in a clean technology plant producing battery components.
fullDescription: The campus produces lithium battery packs for electric vehicles and will hire 35 full-time employees within two years of opening.
